properties.title: SENTINEL-3 TANDEM FOR CLIMATE (S3TC) EXPRO+
properties.description: Detailed study of the inter-satellite discrepancies, differences and uncertainties using data acquired during the Sentinel-3 Tandem phase.
properties.osc:consortium: ACRI-ST S.A.S. (FR), CLS COLLECTE LOCALISATION SATELLITES (FR),NATIONAL PHYSICAL LABORATORY (NPL) (GB),NATURAL ENVIRONMENT RESEARCH COUNCIL (GB),STFC RUTHERFORD APPLETON LABORATORY (GB),UNIVERSITY OF LEEDS, SCHOOL OF EARTH AND ENVIRONMENT (GB)
